utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi. Um, I want to start with a song thats about that moment when you suddenly realize what life is all about. OK, here we go. OK, thank you very much.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow, this is so cool, you guys. The entire city is blacked out!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Mom says it's all of Manhattan, parts of Brooklyn and Queens, and they have no idea when it's coming back on.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow, you guys, this is big.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Pants and a sweater? Why, mom? Who am I gonna meet in a blackout? Power company guys? Eligible looters? Could we talk about this later? OK.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Can I borrow the phone? I want to call my apartment and check on my grandma. What's my number?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God, it's that Victoria's Secret model. Something... something Goodacre.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She's right, it's Jill. Jill Goodacre. Oh my God. I am trapped in an ATM vestibule with Jill Goodacre! Is it a vestibule? Maybe it's an atrium. Oh, yeah, that is the part to focus on, you idiot!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm fine. I'm just stuck at the bank, in an ATM vestibule.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Jill says vestibule... I'm going with vestibule.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: I'm fine. No, I'm not alone... I don't know, some guy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh! Some guy. Some guy. 'Hey Jill, I saw you with some guy last night. Yes, he was some guy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And officiating at tonight's blackout, is Rabbi Tribbiani.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, Chandler's old roomate was Jewish, and these are the only candles we have, so... Happy Chanukah, everyone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Eww, look. Ugly Naked Guy lit a bunch of candles.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Alright, alright, alright. It's been fourteen and a half minutes and you still have not said one word. Oh God, do something. Just make contact, smile!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Would you like to call somebody?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, about 300 guys I went to high school with. Yeah, thanks.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm fine. I'm trppd in an ATM vstbl wth Jll Gdcr.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm trppd... in an ATM vstbl... wth Jll Gdcr!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I have no idea what you just said.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm trppd... in an ATM vstbl... wth JLL GDCR.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God! He's trapped in an ATM vestibule with Jill Goodacre! Chandler, listen.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, like that thought never entered my mind.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: OK, I'll go. OK, senior year of college... on a pool table.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: OK... my weirdest place would have to be... the women's room on the second floor of the New York CIty public library.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! What were you doing in a library?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Disneyland, 1989, 'It's a Small World After All.'

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The ride broke down. So, Carol and I went behind a couple of those mechanical Dutch children... then they fixed the ride, and we were asked never to return to the Magic Kingdom.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh come on, I already went.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, alright. The weirdest place would have to be... ... oh, the foot of the bed.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I just never had a relationship with that kind of passion, you know, where you have to have somebody right there, in the middle of a theme park.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, it was the only thing to do there that didn't have a line.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: There, well, see? Barry wouldn't even kiss me on a miniature golf course.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, he said we were holding up the people behind us.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And you didn't marry him because...?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I mean, do you think there are people who go through life never having that kind of...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Probably. But you know, I'll tell you something. Passion is way overrated.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It is. Eventually, it kind of... burns out. But hopefully, what you're left with is trust, and security, and... well, in the case of my ex-wife, lesbianism. So, you know, for all of those people who miss out on that passion... thing, there's all that other good stuff.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But, um... I don't think that's going to be you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-uh. See, I see.... big passion in your future.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Because you waited too long to make your move, and now you're in the friend zone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no. I'm not in the zone.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross, you're mayor of the zone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm taking my time, alright? I'm laying the groundwork. Yeah. I mean, every day I get just a little bit closer to...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Priesthood! Look Ross, I'm telling you, she has no idea what you're thinking. If you don't ask her out soon you're going to end up stuck in the zone forever.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I will, I will. See, I'm waiting for the right moment. What? What, now?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeeeeaaaahhh! What's messing you up? The wine? The candles? The moonlight? You've just got to go up to her and say, 'Rachel, I think that...'

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We're shushing... because... we're trying to hear something. Listen. Don't you hear that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, then no thanks. What the hell was that? Mental note: If Jill Goodacre offers you gum, you take it. If she offers you mangled animal carcass, you take it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: New York City has no power, and the milk is getting sour. But to me it is not scary, 'cause I stay away from dairy.... la la la, la la, la la...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you going to do it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You come out there, you're a dead man.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: OK, you've got to promise that you'll never, ever tell Ross that I told you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! I love him!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh stop it. Joey already told me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, don't look at me. This is Ross's thing.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This is so typical. I'm always the last one to know everything.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, you are not. We tell you stuff.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yuh-huh! I was the last one to know when Chandler got bitten by the peacock at the zoo. I was the last one to know when you had a crush on Joey when he was moving in. Looks like I was second to last.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OK, I have a question. Well, actually, it's not so much a question as.. more of a general wondering... ment.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OK. Here goes. For a while now, I've been wanting to, um....

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, look at the little cat!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is just Bactine. It won't hurt.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, poor little Tooty is scared to death. We should find his owner.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why don't we just put 'poor little Tooty' out in the hall?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: During a blackout? He'd get trampled!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know, on second thought, gum would be perfection. 'Gum would be perfection'? 'Gum would be perfection.' Could have said 'gum would be nice,' or 'I'll have a stick,' but no, no, no, no. For me, gum is perfection. I loathe myself.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no, the Mendels, they hate all living things, right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Hi. We just found this cat and we're looking for the owner.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He seems to hate you. Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Heckles
utterance.content: Yeah, it's my cat. Give me my cat.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait a minute. What's his name?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Heckles
utterance.content: Mmm. Bob Buttons. Here, Bob Buttons.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oooh! You are a very bad man!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Here, kitty-kitty. Here kitty-kitty. Where did you go, little kitty-kitty-kitty? Here kitty-kitty-kitty-kitty...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Everybody, this is Paolo. Paolo, I want you to meet my friends. This is Monica.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, um... where did Paolo come from?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I mean tonight, in the building. Suddenly. Into our lives.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, the cat... the cat turned out to be Paolo's cat!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That, that is funny... .... and Rachel keeps touching him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Alright. I looked all over the building and I couldn't find the kitty anywhere.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I found him. He was Paolo's cat.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ah! Well! There you go! Last to know again! And I'm guessing... since nobody told me... this is Paolo.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ah, let's see. What next? Blow a bubble. A bubble's good. It's got a... boyish charm, it's impish. Here we go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nice going, imp. OK, it's OK. All I need to do is reach over and put it in my mouth.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Good save! We're back on track, and I'm... ..chewing someone else's gum. This is not my gum. Oh my God! Oh my God! And now you're choking.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: My God, you're choking! That better?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes... thank you. That was... that was....

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Blah blah blah, blah blah blah... blah blaaaaaah....

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wha-What did he say that was so funny?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, you guys, what am I doing? What am I doing? This is so un-me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: If you want, I'll do it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know, I just want to bite his bottom lip. But I won't.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: God, the first time he smiled at me... those three seconds were more exciting than three weeks in Bermuda with Barry.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know, did you ride mopeds? 'Cause I've heard... ... oh, I see... it's not about that right now. OK.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know, I know it's totally superficial and we have absolutely nothing in common, and we don't even speak the same language but Goooooooddddddd....

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Listen. Um, listen. Something you should... know... um, Rachel and I... we're kind of a thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no. Technically the... sex is not... being had, but that's... see, that's not the point. See, um, the point is that... Rachel and I should be, er, together. You know, and if you get in the.... um...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, that's not where I was going. Er, if you get in the... way, of us becoming a thing, then I would be, well, very sad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So you do know a little English.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Do you know the word crapweasel?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's funny, because you know, you are a huge crapweasel!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Chandler, we've been here for an hour doing this! Now watch, it's easy.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: No, you've got to whip it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, look look look. The last candle's about to burn out. 10, 9, 8, 7... ... negative 46, negative 47, negative 48....

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OK, guys, guys? I have the definitive one. Mwwwooooo-hah-hah...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Ross. This probably isn't the best time to bring it up, but you have to throw a party for Monica.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes. Yes, thanks for letting me use your phone... and for saving my life.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Well, goodbye Chandler. I had a great blackout. See ya.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi, um, I'm account number 7143457. And, uh, I don't know if you got any of that, but I would really like a copy of the tape.
